name: nysc-daura-zone-ops
description: A workplace application for Zonal and Local Government Inspectors of the NYSC Daura zone.

scripts.build:
mkdir -p dist && esbuild index.tsx \
      --bundle \
      --minify \
      --outfile=dist/main.js \
      --loader:.ts=ts \
      --loader:.tsx=tsx \
      --define:GEMINI_API_KEY=\"${GEMINI_API_KEY}\" \
      --define:process.env.NODE_ENV=\"production\" \
      && cp index.html dist/index.html \
      && cp -r public dist/public 2>/dev/null || :
